# (PART\*) Unleash {htmltools}: from R to HTML {-}

While building a custom HTML template, you will need to know more about the wonderful [htmltools](https://github.com/rstudio/htmltools). It has the same spirit as devtools, that is, making your web developer life easier. What follows does not have the pretention to be an exhaustive guide about this package. Yet, it will provide you with the main tools to be more efficient.
